logo_usage.logo_requirement: The logo must feature prominently in all visual communications, standing alone without amalgamation with other symbols or graphics.
logo_usage.prominently_displayed: Position the logo on the cover or at the outset of visual communications, maintain clear space, and adhere to minimum size for visibility.
logo_usage.primary_logo_required: Required on all print media, advertising, websites, other media, and external communications.

spelling.initiative_singular: Initiative is singular and should not include an s.
examples: Biji-Biji Initiative - Only first biji is capitalized

restrictions: Do not stray from the color palette.
Do not rearrange elements of the logo.
Do not stretch or distort the logo.
Do not change the orientation of the logo.
Do not use drop shadows when reproducing the logo.

color.note: Avoid placing the logo on surfaces with deeper colors for visibility.

logo_usage.white_space: Maintain x-space and y-space when scaling the logo.

position.note: Use isolation zone rules for readability and recognition.
position.watermark_requirement: Watermark must be added to all photos posted on social media and shared with the public, including press.
